title: Google\Cloud\AIPlatform\V1\Featurestore\OnlineServingConfig
name: OnlineServingConfig
description:
OnlineServingConfig specifies the details for provisioning online serving resources.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.aiplatform.v1.Featurestore.OnlineServingConfig

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.fixed_node_count
params.description: The number of nodes for each cluster. The number of nodes will not scale automatically but can be scaled manually by providing different values when updating. Only one of fixed_node_count and scaling can be set. Setting one will reset the other.

methods.name: getFixedNodeCount
methods.description:

Only one of fixed_node_count and scaling can be set. Setting one will reset the other.
